explanation: [0-0] A man in a black hoodie stands by the kitchen island, talking on his phone. The phone screen displays the text "2070 Hey Grandpa, have you heard this song?" in white font. The walls are white with columns, and there are dark brown chairs.

[0-8] The man in the black hoodie sits down and continues talking, then taps his phone screen with his finger. The scene switches to an old man in black clothes and glasses, who gets up from the sofa with a cane. The man with the phone looks surprised, then the old man starts dancing. There is a dark green carpet on the floor.
